data.name: Powerful Courses
data.detailed_description:
Are you looking for a good game for your collection and a new adventure? It must be difficult to accurately choose a good product if you are not a digital gaming king. Good that you are here now! We want to offer you to combine the pleasant with the useful with the help of this program in game form. Together with us, you will be able to start researching STREAM/STEAM/STEM education methods (Science, Technology, Reading + Writing, Engineering, Art and Mathematics). Add this game to your arsenal and feel like a mad scientist.

Powerful Courses is an educational game in the form of a simulator for learning and self-development. Here, courses of various categories are waiting for you, which will help you train your brain and develop. You only need a computer and a desire to learn to master such fields as computer science, robotics, chemistry, physics, geography, history, economics, and more. Powerful Courses is the evolution of e-learning with tools such as mini-games, puzzles, interesting tasks and tests. Instead of the boring lessons that school requires, various table games and board games (checkers, chess, sudoku, tags, puzzles, cards), tests about the world, countries, their capitals and flags, seas and oceans, cars and ships, animals and nature, space and planets...

If you are a pupil or student, you need to count all the time. Addition, subtraction, multiplication and division... Is it easy to do without a calculator? An exam at school requires you to calculate quickly. It seems that this mission is not simple, but arithmetic is easy! You need the right tactics to go from beginner to master or expert. This program will become your teacher and show you the optimal algorithm of actions.

Even if you are an adult, life requires you to think not locally, but globally. You need to properly build a strategy for the future. Accuracy and speed of the brain is an important component of success. It is also important to train memory and attentiveness. In addition, you will find bites on such topics as logic, IQ, IT, robotics and artificial intelligence, the basics of programming, fast typing on the keyboard, and more. In theoretical materials, you can read facts about sports, music, money, casinos and other interesting things. Practice your cursor speed to shoot better in the shooter. You can do all this in Powerful Courses.

Each course is a new step for the mind. This is not magic, but the wonders of e-learning. Learning is not boring. Exploring the unknown is always interesting. The courses consist of theory and practice. You will receive scores while completing practical tasks. When you complete all stages of the course, you can get a certificate (game achievement). Its design will depend on the total number of scores you will receive. Your friends might want to play too. You can organize a competition for the best certificate in different courses. It will be a good knowledge race.

Make an investment in your future skills. Experience the power of the mind, a new pace of life, power and energy. Let's start training the brain!
